name: House3
_source: s;CorridonWife;	You!{w} Corridon was fighting out there!	Is he alright?{w} What's going on?
s;{unit};Corridon is safe, don't worry.{w} He's	fighting with us as we speak.
s;CorridonWife;	Oh, thank the Goddess...{w} In that	case, I'll follow behind you all.{w}{clear}You can have this, too.{w} Also, a	word of advice{semiclon}{w} Don't go next door.

s;CorridonWife;That spot next to the house, it's...{w}{clear}I don't know how to describe it, but	it's felt dreadful since last night.{w}{clear}The door's locked, thank goodness, so there's no wandering in, but...{w}{clear}I think something terrible happened	there, but I can't be sure.{w}{clear}Just stay away.{w} For your own sake.
s;{unit};Something so terrible you can feel 	the dread lingering?{w} Sounds fishy.{w}{clear}	Maybe I should check it out.
